select distinct f.id, f.type, f.business_id, f.name, f.template, f.point_type, f.point_content, f.head_pic, f.sort, f.enabled, f.create_time, f.update_time, f.create_user_id, f.update_user_id, f.disabled from column_operate_fields f left join column_operate_fields_content c on f.id=c.field_id where f.type = 2 and f.point_type = 0 and f.point_content = 0 and f.business_id = #{storeId} and c.business_id = #{storeSkuId} order by f.sort desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO column_operate_fields ( id, type, business_id, name, template, point_type, point_content, head_pic, sort, enabled, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, disabled ) SELECT REPLACE (UUID(), '-', '') AS id, 2 AS type, bb.id AS business_id, aa.name, aa.template, aa.point_type, aa.point_content, aa.head_pic, aa.sort, aa.enabled, aa.create_time, aa.update_time, aa.create_user_id, aa.update_user_id, aa.disabled FROM column_operate_fields aa INNER JOIN store_info bb ON ( bb.type = 2 AND aa.type = 1 AND aa.business_id = '0' ) WHERE bb.id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
